headline: Truist Securities Asserts ‘Buy’ Rating on ServiceNow Inc. (NOW), Downplays Seat-Based Growth Concerns
summary: ServiceNow, Inc. (NYSE:NOW) is one of the best tech stocks to buy for the long term. The company has demonstrated strong revenue growth of 21% over the past 12 months, supported by solid profit margins of 78.5%. Consequently, on September 8, analysts at Truist Securities reiterated a ‘Buy’ rating on the stock and a $1,200 […]
